meanings.definition: The action of making someone or something unable to function properly.
meanings.sent1: The disablements caused by the broken elevator were frustrating for the residents.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended physical therapy to prevent further disablements.
meanings.sent3: The disablements of the remote control made it impossible to change the channel.
meanings.sent4: The disablements of the security system left the building vulnerable to intruders.
meanings.sent5: The disablements of the computer system resulted in a complete shutdown of operations.

meanings.definition: The state of being unable to function properly.
meanings.sent1: She struggled with the disablements in her legs after the accident.
meanings.sent2: The disablements of the old machinery led to frequent breakdowns.
meanings.sent3: The disablements of the alarm clock caused her to oversleep every morning.
meanings.sent4: The disablements of the traffic lights caused chaos on the streets.
meanings.sent5: The disablements of the phone battery left her stranded without communication.
